briefTitle: An Evaluation Of BW430C (Lamotrigine) Versus Placebo In The Prevention Of Mood Episodes In Bipolar I Disorder Patients
officialTitle: Study SCA104779, an Evaluation of BW430C (Lamotrigine) Versus Placebo in the Prevention of Mood Episodes in Bipolar I Disorder Patients
summary: This study is planned to objectively assess the efficacy and safety of lamotrigine maintenance therapy after symptoms of mood episode had been stabilised by open-label treatment with lamotrigine alone or in combination with other psychotropic medication in patients with bipolar I disorder.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Randomization to Study Withdrawal (up to Week 26)
